steps.retrieved_evidence: I think there might be some confusion! The question "even Minnesota has a Batman" seems unrelated to NASA, aliens, or microbial life evidence. It appears to be a humorous or whimsical statement, possibly referencing the 1960s TV show "Batman" that featured a character named Batman who was not actually from Minnesota (but perhaps the state has its own version of the caped crusader?).
